DOC.brief_summary: Display of information regarding utilization and quality to primary care physicians as they use our computer based system to order radiologic imaging (CT, MR, etc) will reduce unnecessary imaging.
DOC.brief_title: Concurrent Electronic Order Entry Variation Reporting Impact on Ordering Behavior
DOC.criteria: PCPs at MGH with patient panel > 99 loyal patients PCPs at MGH with patient panel < 99 loyal patients
DOC.keyword: this study does not look at patient conditions
